description: Veteran VTC instructor Bobby Rogers guides you through an in-depth review of the Linux+ LX0-101 exam from a very practical, hands-on perspective. This course provides step-by-step demonstrations of the different commands, utilities, and configuration options you really need to know before taking the exam. Bobby covers all domains and objectives required for the exam, including installation, hardware configuration, package management, and file management. This title is a self-paced software training course delivered via pre-recorded video. We do not provide additional information outside of the posted content.
title: CompTIA Linux+ (Exam LX0-101)
